language-markdown"><span><span><span class="hljs-section"># WP Starter Theme</span></span><span>

A simple, framework-agnostic starter theme for WordPress projects.  
It provides a clean foundation for organizing HTML, CSS (Less or SCSS), and JavaScript, without enforcing specific frameworks or libraries.

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## ðŸš€ Quick Start</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">1.</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Clone the repo and install dependencies:**</span></span><span>
   <span class="hljs-code">```sh
   cd tools/
   npm install
</span></span></span></code></div></div></pre>

</li>

http-server
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="766" data-end="807">Then open the server URL in your browser.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="809" data-end="812">
<h2 data-start="814" data-end="826">CSS Setup</h2>
<h3 data-start="828" data-end="836">Less</h3>
<ul data-start="837" data-end="1037">
<li data-start="837" data-end="916">
<p data-start="839" data-end="916"><code data-start="839" data-end="856">index-less.html</code> links to <code data-start="866" data-end="878">style.less</code>, compiled in-browser via <code data-start="904" data-end="913">less.js</code>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="917" data-end="966">
<p data-start="919" data-end="966">Allows quick development without build steps.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="967" data-end="1037">
<p data-start="969" data-end="1037">You can also compile Less via <strong data-start="999" data-end="1007">Gulp</strong>, <strong data-start="1009" data-end="1020">CodeKit</strong>, or <strong data-start="1025" data-end="1036">PrePros</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="1039" data-end="1047">SCSS</h3>
<ul data-start="1048" data-end="1175">
<li data-start="1048" data-end="1116">
<p data-start="1050" data-end="1116"><code data-start="1050" data-end="1067">index-scss.html</code> links to a compiled <code data-start="1088" data-end="1094">.css</code> file in <code data-start="1103" data-end="1113">/assets/</code>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1117" data-end="1175">
<p data-start="1119" data-end="1175">CSS is compiled with <strong data-start="1140" data-end="1148">Gulp</strong> (or another preprocessor).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1177" data-end="1180">

<ul data-start="1401" data-end="1524">

<p data-start="1403" data-end="1467"><strong data-start="1403" data-end="1413">Do not</strong> commit <code data-start="1421" data-end="1431">/assets/</code> â€” build pipeline generates these.</p>

<p data-start="1470" data-end="1524"><strong data-start="1470" data-end="1480">Commit</strong> <code data-start="1481" data-end="1488">/src/</code> and essential configs in <code data-start="1514" data-end="1523">/tools/</code>.</p>
</li>

<hr data-start="1526" data-end="1529">
<h2 data-start="1531" data-end="1549">CSS Conventions</h2>
<p data-start="1551" data-end="1632">The theme is <strong data-start="1564" data-end="1581">unopinionated</strong> on preprocessors but <strong data-start="1603" data-end="1618">opinionated</strong> on structure.</p>
<ul data-start="1634" data-end="1777">
<li data-start="1634" data-end="1703">
<p data-start="1636" data-end="1703"><strong data-start="1636" data-end="1646">/base/</strong> â†’ global styles (typography, forms, resets, utilities)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1704" data-end="1777">
<p data-start="1706" data-end="1777"><strong data-start="1706" data-end="1722">/components/</strong> â†’ self-contained components with minimal specificity</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1779" data-end="1791"><strong data-start="1779" data-end="1791">Example:</strong></p>

<hr data-start="2432" data-end="2435">
<h2 data-start="2437" data-end="2450">JavaScript</h2>
<ul data-start="2452" data-end="2688">
<li data-start="2452" data-end="2518">
<p data-start="2454" data-end="2518">Use <strong data-start="2458" data-end="2475">uncompiled JS</strong> during development for faster iteration.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2519" data-end="2556">
<p data-start="2521" data-end="2556">Compile only when testing builds.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2557" data-end="2610">
<p data-start="2559" data-end="2610">Default library: <strong data-start="2576" data-end="2586">jQuery</strong> (WordPress standard).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2611" data-end="2688">
<p data-start="2613" data-end="2688">Place custom JS in <code data-start="2632" data-end="2643">script.js</code>. Split into modules if it grows too large.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2690" data-end="2693">
<h2 data-start="2695" data-end="2704">Images</h2>
<ul data-start="2706" data-end="2829">
<li data-start="2706" data-end="2745">
<p data-start="2708" data-end="2745">Place source images in <code data-start="2731" data-end="2742">/src/img/</code>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2746" data-end="2829">
<p data-start="2748" data-end="2829">Reference them in CSS from <code data-start="2775" data-end="2789">/assets/img/</code>, where optimized versions are output.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2831" data-end="2834">
<h2 data-start="2836" data-end="2849">Gulp Usage</h2>
<p data-start="2851" data-end="2888">Run all Gulp commands from <code data-start="2878" data-end="2887">/tools/</code>.</p>
<p data-start="2890" data-end="2910"><strong data-start="2890" data-end="2910">Available tasks:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="2912" data-end="3264">
<li data-start="2912" data-end="2950">
<p data-start="2914" data-end="2950"><code data-start="2914" data-end="2920">gulp</code> â†’ watch &amp; compile JS + SCSS</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2951" data-end="2984">
<p data-start="2953" data-end="2984"><code data-start="2953" data-end="2969">gulp watchScss</code> â†’ watch SCSS</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2985" data-end="3035">
<p data-start="2987" data-end="3035"><code data-start="2987" data-end="3006">gulp watchAllScss</code> â†’ watch JS + SCSS + images</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3036" data-end="3069">
<p data-start="3038" data-end="3069"><code data-start="3038" data-end="3054">gulp watchLess</code> â†’ watch Less</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3070" data-end="3120">
<p data-start="3072" data-end="3120"><code data-start="3072" data-end="3091">gulp watchAllLess</code> â†’ watch JS + Less + images</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3121" data-end="3150">
<p data-start="3123" data-end="3150"><code data-start="3123" data-end="3137">gulp watchJs</code> â†’ watch JS</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3151" data-end="3185">
<p data-start="3153" data-end="3185"><code data-start="3153" data-end="3168">gulp watchImg</code> â†’ watch images</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3186" data-end="3264">
<p data-start="3188" data-end="3264"><code data-start="3188" data-end="3203">gulp scssTask</code> / <code data-start="3206" data-end="3216">lessTask</code> / <code data-start="3219" data-end="3227">jsTask</code> / <code data-start="3230" data-end="3239">imgTask</code> â†’ one-off build &amp; quit</p>
</li>
</ul>

<h2 data-start="3458" data-end="3476">Running Locally</h2>
<p data-start="3478" data-end="3540">Donâ€™t open HTML files directlyâ€”serve them with a local server.</p>
<p data-start="3542" data-end="3627"><strong data-start="3542" data-end="3584">Option 1: VSCode Live Server (GoLive!)</strong><br data-start="3584" data-end="3587">
<strong data-start="3587" data-end="3627">Option 2: http-server (recommended):</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="3629" data-end="3677"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl">sh</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0
